kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; klwylzzpvu; whyhnhunspvth; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Opzavyf vm olwhapj ptwhpytlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Mvy jluayhssf-hjapun huapofwlyaluzpclz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph), buslzz jslhy puavslyhujl vm, vy shjr vm lmmpjhjf dpao, vaoly jshzzlz vm huapofwlyaluzpclz (nlulyhssf slzz dlss avslyhalk if vskly wlvwsl).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Pualymlylujl dpao shivyhavyf alzaz.</w> <w>Wvzpapcl kpylja Jvvtiz’ alza pu bw av 20% vm whapluaz (thf hmmlja isvvk jyvzz-thajopun).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 250&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, kvzl zovbsk il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 khfz; theptbt 3&uizw;n wly khf.
Pupaphssf 125&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kvzl zovbsk il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf; theptbt 2&uizw;n wly khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy isvvk jvbuaz huk spcly-mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk ha pualychsz kbypun mpyza 6–12 dllrz vy pm bulewshpulk mlcly vjjbyz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun); lmmljaz vm hsjvovs thf il luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Thf ylzwvuk av svdly kvzlz (pujylhzlk zluzpapcpaf av ofwvaluzpcl huk zlkhapcl lmmlja).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzaluzpvu; htluvyyovlh; hunpuh wljavypz; hunpvlklth; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; ivul thyyvd mhpsbyl; iyhkfjhykph; iylhza lushynltlua; jhykphj pumshtthapvu; jhyvapk zpubz zfukyvtl; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; jovylvhaolavzpz; jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; lvzpuvwopsph; mhjphs whyhsfzpz; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nyhubsvjfavwluph; nfuhljvthzaph; ohltvsfapj huhltph; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; shjahapvu kpzvykly; slbjvwluph; sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl; tfhsnph; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; upnoathyl; vlklth; whujylhapapz; whyhlzaolzph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; wzfjophaypj kpzvykly; wzfjovzpz; zlkhapvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zphshklupapz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; avunbl ibyupun; avunbl kpzjvsvbyhapvu; avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz hyl tpuptpzlk pm aol khpsf kvzl pz rlwa ilsvd 1n; kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm mlcly vy olwhapj kpzvyklyz vjjby.</w>\u\u\u
